statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE risk_level > 5 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';

DELETE FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name = 'Heart Disease' AND factor_value > 5;

DELETE FROM HighRiskPatients WHERE patient_id = 101 AND risk_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 201 AND visit_date < '2022-01-01';
